Reviews.Title: Good indoor daylight camera
Reviews.Author: Lloyd W. Hayes "Lloyd"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these, then ordered a 3rd. They are cheap cameras which work well in daylight. They have good low-light capability too. But forget about the night vision. You can barely see the outline of an object just a few feet from the camera.My main complaint about this camera is the mounting system. You must remove the mounting bracket. The bracket is attached to the camera with 2 very tiny screws. I ordered a 3rd camera because I dropped 2 of these mounting screws, 1 at a time, and couldn't find them. These small mounting screws will fit under my fingernail. The camera should have a different mounting bracket.Bottom line is that this is a nice general purpose daylight indoor camera which is cheap. Just keep a magnet close by when you mount it. The night I.F. lights should not be a consideration in your purchase.

Reviews.Title: 'EYES ON IT'
Reviews.Author: Darkstar
Reviews.Content: Love it!!!1).Simple and clear instructions.2).Easy to set up and use w/VCR or DVD.3).Great picture for the price.

Reviews.Title: High quality picture
Reviews.Author: Red Pine & Oxville RR
Reviews.Content: More than I expected for the money.The black dots are just plugs to seal the holes other models need for night vision.This one dosent have night vision.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Image, Great Price.
Reviews.Author: C. Martinez
Reviews.Content: We have a 16 channel DVR with some extra open channels. I wanted an inexpensive camera to mount in a cabinet to monitor the electric meter. I just plugged it in this afternoon, and it is not at all what I was expecting. The image is fantastic. The audio is clear and crisp. All through a 100' cable. For $14 I am impressed! The cameras that came with the security system are washed out by comparison. Made for "night" vision they have no IR filter so plants and clothing are shown in false color. This little camera has as good or better resolution, rich vibrant color, and a better image in twilight than the others that range in cost from $30 to $60. For a tiny camera, the case is metal and surprisingly heavy and solid feeling. We'll see how it does at night, but since we have low wattage security lighting outside I expect it will be fine for what we need. The only knock is that it's not a weather resistant camera. But at this price and size it should be easy to make a watertight enclosure for it. A two inch PVC pipe should be sufficient in most cases I would think. I am placing an order for 5 more tomorrow!

Reviews.Title: amazing little camera
Reviews.Author: amazing person
Reviews.Content: I got this little thing because of the price. And it turned out to work like a charm very clear and easy to set up. The instructions were very clear also. There was one minor problem no screws but even if there were screws i would not damage the walls in my house.P.S. if this happens to you to use the 3M product with stickiness on both of the sides.

Reviews.Title: Mini Camera with Audio
Reviews.Author: USA
Reviews.Content: Tiny and indiscreet. Picks up sound very well and the video is surprisingly clear. This could be placed almost anywhere you need to use such an item. I was going to put it to use in a nursing home situation but unfortunately never had time before it was no longer needed. I am glad I purchased it and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Picture is actually pretty nice for the size
Reviews.Author: Jerry Helsing "jlhelsing"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for security in my shed due to missing items.  It was very easy to install and hide so that it wasn't able to be seen unless you were looking for it.  I then hooked it up to an old VCR we had stored in the attic.  The picture is quite good for the size.  I do wish that there was a USB version of the camera with a motion sensor capability because it really wasn't fun to watch the video to capture many hours of nothing for days to find 60 seconds with someone taking a flat head screwdriver.  Now, it told me who was taking my stuff, but if it had a built in motion sensor and was connected to a computer, I would have saved myself many hours of headache.

Reviews.Title: Great little spy camera...
Reviews.Author: Sabine Montero
Reviews.Content: I have this little camera installed at the front door of my house, it works great, has a very good image. Haven't used the audio, no big deal, don't need it. I can receive the reception on my PC with a video card adapter or can watch it on my TV with no problem. Now I can see who is knocking on my door, and can decide to open or not. LOL! I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for price
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I ordered four cameras to use with a four channel DVR that I had sitting on the self, so could not pass on the price when I saw them.  I noticed in other reviews that the little black dots are nothing but plugs and had no function (possibly for IR LEDs for another model).  Upon opening the boxes, I noticed that the cameras do have IR LEDs installed.  I checked the model marked on the box and they are the same model as ordered.  So, I guess this is a bonus for me.  Maybe all newer models ship with the IR's.  The camera specs state that the camera is powered by 12VDC, however all the units I received have 9VDC adapters included.  I guess this should be okay, as the cameras most likely regulate this source voltage down to on lower internal working voltage, i.e. 5VDC or the like.  A spec sheet is included.  As others had noted, there is no mounting screw, just a tilting base mounted to the camera with three holes for screws, etc.  I tested one camera directly connected to a monitor and was satisfied with the picture.  The camera can be focused by turning the lens, screwing it in or out.  There is a lens cap that you will need to remove (if it doesn't fall off anyway).  I tested the camera by placing it in a parts storage room and have good results.  The bonus IR LED's might as well be little black do nothing dots.  The IR does work, but the subject need to be pretty darn close.  Don't expect to have night vision here, but as with any CCTV camera you can always add an IR flood light.  There was one reviewer that said he/she had ordered three or four cameras and one was bad out of the box.  I have not tested all four yet but the two I have tested are okay.  I will do an update if I find any issues later.  I gave the camera 4 out of 5 only because the cameras shipped with a power adapter that is not what the specs called for as well as the spec sheets are a little confusing (there are two image device models available - 1/4" CCD or 1/3" CMOS, but there is no indication which the camera has). - Rick

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: jmat
Reviews.Content: i purchased this reading the reviews written here. I was dissapointed in that ;1 - it had no instructions, 2- the site did not mention what other things were needed, 3- it is black and white although the cover mentions color, 4- no night vision.Another thing is that the connection port- ie "video port"  is not compatible in the East.The good thing is that the picture is clear although zoom is not an option an price is good.

Reviews.Title: A very good basic indoor camera!
Reviews.Author: Eric V
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a basic no frill's camera, this is it! We us this for monitoring a supply room at my place of work and it works just fine!  The screen image is a bit grainy, but works well! For the price, it just cant be beat! If your looking high quality image and night vision, you will need to spend alot more money and look elsewhere! Pair this camera up with a VideoSecu 50 Feet Power Video Audio Security Camera Cable Wire with Free BNC RCA Adapter 1JC , and you got a nice basic cheap, Video system. A very good deal at a low cost!! Have fun!

Reviews.Title: A fine product to use in the day.
Reviews.Author: pablo luperon
Reviews.Content: Works okay but i  cannot use this item in the dark because it doesnt have night vision LeD. Only usable in the morning and afternoon. Or maybe you could use it at night with a lantern or lightbulb

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: jonnyed83
Reviews.Content: For the price, what else could you ask for?  The camera and microphone work great and the unit has very flexible mounting.  If you are looking for a basic camera for basic applications, this is what you should buy.  You cannot beat the functionality for the price!  I did purchase a 50 ft power,video, and audio wire extension for $10 which made it very easy to put anywhere I like.  Cords are very easy to conceal as well.  Very basic and effective! VideoSecu 50 Feet Power Video Audio CCTV Security Camera Cable Wire with Free BNC RCA Adapter 1JC

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Joe C
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much from this camera but it works surprisingly well. I would not pay more than $15 for it though. The colors are a bit washed out but if used for its intended purpose, it will be fine. Mine did not come with IR LEDS (expected) so that should be noted but they did include a power supply which is unusual for small cameras like this. If you need a cheap wired camera though, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Great for teachers to use as a document camera
Reviews.Author: Dalevis
Reviews.Content: My wife teaches first grade and had an old document camera she paid hundreds for years ago that had lackluster video quality.  I took a chance on this little guy about 18 months ago and she uses it most days in the classroom.  The color saturation and picture quality are more than useable, better than her old camera at a fraction of the cost (years later, of course).  I connected it into the composite input on her classroom's ceiling-mounted projector (which is remote-controlled).  Now she turns on the projector and chooses the composite input (instead of the usual VGA input from her PC) and uses this camera to read books to the class, show examples of worksheets, etc.  The children also take turns showing off their work to the rest of the class.It DOES focus - the black ring around the lens DOES turn and DOES focus the camera.  A few tweeks in the projector's setup to adjust for brightness/contrast/etc and you're away.  I mounted it to her old-school transparency overhead projector (the top part that elevates to lowers to focus), removing one of the screws in it, putting it back in place with this camera's flat metal mount in-between it and the screw's head.  Now she has her PC/Promethean board, transparency projector, or document camera all immediately available for use...and for cheap!

Reviews.Title: I have this little camera and I love it!
Reviews.Author: TrickyRicky
Reviews.Content: Over the years I have paid more and gotten less for security cameras.For no more than this little camera is you can't beat it.Excellent color, won't washout like others do.The Price is Right.For better night vision I put the camera behind an outside yard light.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional Little Camera - NO IR Night Vision!
Reviews.Author: Smedsters
Reviews.Content: I was extremely impressed by this little CMOS color camera.  Out of 3 that I ordered, 2 of them worked without problems.  The 3rd didn't work at all.  Other than a lack of having IR night vision (the 6 little round dots seen in the picture are not IR - they are filler pieces of plastic for where the IR would be) I completely recommend this camera.  In addition, the lens is adjustable for getting the picture focused and color was reproduced nicely for an inexpensive CMOS camera!

Reviews.Title: I love it...not to sure the local kids do.
Reviews.Author: George Larsen
Reviews.Content: Hey, this is supposed to be for inside use....Its been out doors for two winters now. ya out of rain and snow, and it works just as good as the day I got it.

Reviews.Title: Lot of bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Joshua M. Robinson "Purrfect Printing"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this to aim at my front door from the inside of the house. I mounted it so you could get a clear picture of the persons face at the door. Also I wanted to be able to record the conversation when answering the door. The reason I was attracted to this was because of the audio feature/price. My many more expensive outdoor cameras do not have audio. We had an incident a few weeks back and was asked if there was an audio recording to go with the video. I had to say no while mentally kicking myself for never installing audio. I am really surprised how decent the picture looks. I did not expect much for 10.00 and free shipping actually I thought it would wind up in the garbage as lesson learned. I Also love the size I was able to install it in a place that your would not notice it and took the time to hide the wires. My only complaint is that the screws that hold the camera to the bracket are so tiny. I made sure I had a magnetic screwdriver ready after reading other reviews here.

Reviews.Title: HEY IT WORKS
Reviews.Author: The guys at computer tv iphone repair
Reviews.Content: WORKED GREAT FOR OUR NEEDS..ABLE TO VEIW AREAS AROUD OUR SHOP..ALL UNDER 20 BUCKSWE WILL GET MORETHANKS....

Reviews.Title: Infrared issues.
Reviews.Author: Dex
Reviews.Content: This is a great mini-camera with limited abilities. However, a few things did go wrong with the one I got.First the good. The case is very strong, stronger metal than I expected. The lens is a wider lens than I had before, it even comes with a lens cap. I didn't try the audio/microphone so I can't talk about that.Now the bad. It is true that the infrared lights can only illuminate a short distance, but the image will show both the color image from both light and darker areas at the same time, or at least it seemed that way. But my biggest disappointment is that the color of the video image seemed to 'burn out' after about a week. The metal case can be very warm to the touch when in use, and I think that is from the infrared lamps (3 on each side of the lens). That heat seemed to remove the blue channel from the imaging unit, leaving everything looking yellowish brown and unrealistic.The one thing that is good after all this is, I didn't lose a lot of money. Paying less than $20 means that I feel no need to contact the seller about this. This was just for "playing around" with, and not for professional use. If I needed something more, I would've invested more money in an Infrared camera.If the video image hadn't degraded in such a short time, I would have rated 5 stars; it is a good camera for the price, but better in a colder environment and as nothing more than an "informal" video camera.Update: The cheaper, non-IR camera (not this one) that I use as a security monitor camera is still working fine after being constantly plugged in for months. The lesson I learned was that if I want an IR capable camera, I am better off paying a higher price. But for a dependable daylight camera, a non-IR camera (for about the same price) will do fine.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: L. G. Macias Sanchez "Lgmaciasler"
Reviews.Content: This video camera don't have a impressive image quality, but in good light conditions can do a decent job, and come on,  this is only a  camera of $15.00,  I think is a good choice for your money.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: M. Lerner
Reviews.Content: very small , and very cheap camera , the cost/beneficie is great ,easy to install , good for house .

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: T. Sipos
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for its price. Mine is OUTDOORS and it works great for an indoor camera. I absolutely love it.

Reviews.Title: This mini camera is small enough to hide
Reviews.Author: Fran Whewell
Reviews.Content: I needed a hidden mini camera, for survalence, while employees worked, in my home. This one works well, because you can hide it, easily.

Reviews.Title: Clear Picture
Reviews.Author: Shari Brunt "Sharebear"
Reviews.Content: The camera has a very clear picture.  IT DOES NOT have wireless capability as the ad says, so that part is completely false.  I wasn't able to connect to a DVR, but it will connect to the TV, but no recording, unless you own a VCR.

Reviews.Title: Works very well, better than expected. First thoughts...
Reviews.Author: Jun
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with mild expectations. The camera is surprisingly very good at covering over 400 sqft. Initially, it overlooked the main entrance to my house; however, after experiencing the good quality of video and field-of-view, the camera (in weatherproof housing) was positioned over my BBQ area (15' x 25').I recommend this camera if one is looking for a low-cost RCA camera. I plan on buying several more (pending on the camera's endurance and reliability).Note: I bought a 60' extension cable and infrared lights to compliment the camera. The camera is part of a computer surveillance system. I hope this camera, considering the cost, will last for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Very surprised, works well.
Reviews.Author: Jorge C.
Reviews.Content: Can be focused, does have a power cable that is plugged into outlet via the red cable. hard to mount as I never knew what to use to mount the camera somewhere.

Reviews.Title: No clear instructions.
Reviews.Author: pipermom
Reviews.Content: The instructions aren't clear on how to set this up.  I'm an amateur, so I need step by step instructions.  Also, it seems like I may need something other than what is included here.  Any ideas???

Reviews.Title: 2nd Cam better than the 1st that  I ordered
Reviews.Author: J. Mclin "Marana Jack"
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd one that I have bought in the past 2 years, and both were different!  The 1st one gave my video equip problems in trying to sync up (vertically) and acted more like 50 Hz than 60 Hz (?).  My 2nd and most recent purchase of this cam yielded a stable pic.Also the 1st one would sometimes turn on after power off with a 'psychodelic' pic in regards to the colors---re-setting power cleared up the problem. My 2nd cam had a very good color pic w/o any problems.My 1st cam had a more narrow field of view (FOV) as compared to my 2nd cam with a wider FOV.  Comparable to the typical monitoring cams that I have purchased of different brands.And, finally the spec sheet says 3 Lux CMOS chip (?) with my 2nd cam having much better sensitivity than my 1st,---I would say my 2nd cam was more like a higher-sensitivity 1 Lux or less and gave very good low light (non-IR equipped) performance.I am very happy with my 2nd cam and shud have sent the 1st one back to shipper when I first recvd it....

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jim Gray
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to put in a bluebird nest box about 90 feet from my house. I spent a lot of time comparing specifications of similar cameras and found all the descriptions lacking in the detail I wanted. In the end I decided to take a chance on this one and it worked out good.I specifically wanted a camera that was color, had sound built-in, and had LED lights for viewing the nest under low lighting conditions, and had a good picture. What I learned:1) Picture. The 380 line resolution is as good as an old analog TV. It would be nice to have a higher resolution but this one works okay. I get some diagonal line distortion in the picture that I don't like but can live with it.2) Lights. Some mini cameras have LED lights but this one didn't. It looks like it does but no, just black plastic inserts. And I wanted to find out how much heat LED lights would put out and if they were on all the time but there was no information anywhere. I even found the LYD website but their information was even worse. I think the LYD CM203CA has lights but it wasn't clear if it also sound and color. Other reviewers said their .....208CA had lights but mine didn't.3) Focusing. I wanted more information on focusing but again it was lacking. By twisting the lens right or left this camera can be focused, and it focuses good as close as 2 inches, a good thing.4) Sound. The cable I am using to connect to the TV is 100', and I get a medium grade hum. I haven't experimented with eliminating the hum yet by trying another cable or routing the present on around an electrical outlet. I just turn the sound down as it is not good. When the bluebird eggs hatch I will be able to tell more about the sound.Buying this camera was a low cost experiment (camera + cable = less than $34) and it has worked out okay. I will look to improve some of the features mentioned above with other cameras, but I am enjoying the nest box camera now that I have it focused properly.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: got my item, how ever the video didn't work, for about 20 seconds you could see out of the camera but it was so blurry and in black and whitecomplete waste, it also takes over 2 weeks to return

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive if limited resolution
Reviews.Author: Joseph R. Norman "bnorman"
Reviews.Content: I got this to use on a DVR to record what our dogs were doing while we were gone. I could mount the camera close to the DVR so opted to not get one that transmits. I comes with a power supply but you will need a standard RCA A/V patch cord.

Reviews.Title: what was i thinking
Reviews.Author: Matthew blackwell
Reviews.Content: i would rather eat a light bulb vs spending another minute trying to get this piece of junk to work. the wires must be faulty cuz if i wiggle the connection around ill get an image for a brief moment, but a mouse fart could blow it loose again. i wish i had two more hands to give it 4 thumbs down.

Reviews.Title: My best hope to record faces
Reviews.Author: skamaniac
Reviews.Content: The little camera has been put in a small decorative birdhouse and is setting facing the window.  The pictures are in color, and very clear, with sound .  The other end of the cable is attached to a home computer and is being recorded.  The whole neighborhood is being disrupted because of these almost nightly attacks on someone and once inside they are very destructive.  Stealing, breaking furniture and other acts of vandalism.  The price is right.  I may order some others.  C.M.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: vikingold48
Reviews.Content: small enough to hide so no one can see it great way to keep an eye on things outside my front door

Reviews.Title: i think this works - but the sound is no all there
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: I like the size and the long line - about a foot or longer.  I used it to watch night critters crawling through the attic - omg.  we should get rid of blown insulations - strange stuff can live up there - cockroaches that eat other cockroaches. national geographic material in your attic.

Reviews.Title: Fine little device - good resolution & color. Now have to figure out what to do with it.
Reviews.Author: s80tom
Reviews.Content: If the device fit a need I had, I'd probably give it 5 stars. But it works precisely as advertised. Wouldn't hesitate to buy another one if I had the need. Would recommended it to someone if they could use something of this nature.

Reviews.Title: so impressed
Reviews.Author: ashley
Reviews.Content: This little thing is seriously well made. Plugs right into tv and works as it should. Instructions could be more clear, but if you cant figure it out, well...

Reviews.Title: for the price, its great
Reviews.Author: shannon
Reviews.Content: I would say you def. get what you pay for here.  After purchasing and setting it up, I realized, why would I want such a tiny camera that is not wireless, or has night vision, you might as well get one that is a little bigger and better quality ect. but if you have a use for it , by all means grab one, picture is good quality, comes with what it says. nice condition. overall a satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: RC FPV set up
Reviews.Author: Sean Spies
Reviews.Content: I cut open the connectors for this camera and used it in my 5.8Ghz FPV setup. It works pretty well, with a very nice resolution. At first I didn't know how to wire it but eventually I figured it out, almost at the cost of my 5.8Ghz transmitter. The lens that it comes with is not wide angle at all but it screws in and out so I assume it is replaceable. As for mounting, with the metal bracket it is quite easy. I was able to make a pan tilt mount by mounting a servo in the center mounting hole and then a second one on the screw holding the bracket in. At first I tried to mount this into a plane but it is made of a pretty heavy metal so I was afraid my planes wings would fold in. When I tried to take the metal covering off I found a problem. The lens screws into the metal shell, not anywhere underneath so it is very difficult to mount without the casing. That pretty much ended my FPV flying with this camera, however I also have an RC car which I can mount this to and weight isn't really a problem so I was able to mount it quite easily. Note that driving an RC car low to the ground will significantly reduce the range you can achieve for FPV, at least for my 200mW 5.8Ghz system. Saying that, I was able to still get a few hundred feet of range with upgraded antennas, spironets and a helical. One additional feature of this camera is that it has audio, which may not seem like anything for the plane FPV guys, but for an RC car it makes a world of difference. If anybody needs help setting up a similar FPV system do not hesitate to ask me, I try to check my email often and will respond as soon as I can.Overall this is a very heavy duty camera which can take crashes at about 20Mph and still work effectively, it can detect IR, and does OK with lowlight. Really its a steal for the price!

Reviews.Title: Peeky Boo
Reviews.Author: Pattie Ross
Reviews.Content: For the money this is a great unit with a great picture. The only thing you have to do is figure out how to capture if you want. Size is small and color is great.

Reviews.Title: I have a set of these. You can buy a set @ harbor freight with a 3" lcd.
Reviews.Author: Michael Naughton
Reviews.Content: They come with an lcd monitor and instead of that stand they are on a swivel with a base and the screws holding that stand hold a visor. They actually work well compared to even more expensive cameras. They have a Mic the kit if you buy it has x2 S-Video ins and little pig tail adapters you plug the rca and power into and the monitor powers them with out the monitor you just use a power supply. Thats an $80 set up when u can get 2 of these for 30$ plus a probably bigger and better mini lcd for 16-30$.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey R. Rajca
Reviews.Content: It cannot see in total darkness but it does give a clear picture. I would purchase another if I needed one.

Reviews.Title: Is a great cam
Reviews.Author: yskander flores
Reviews.Content: Love it!!!1).Simple and clear instructions.2).Easy to set up and use w/VCR or DVD.3).Great picture for the price.This item arrived very quickly in perfect condition. I would recommend it and I would buy it again. It worked perfectly.Is a great item

Reviews.Title: Mini Camera with fake IR lights
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Its very small but also very hard to mount. The mounting bracket has a screw hole in it but you can't get the screw in without taking off the bracket, which is held on with 2 of the tiniest screws you will ever see. The picture on mine is ok at 16 inches but a bit blurry beyond that. Mine has 6 tiny little FAKE IR lights on it. They are only on it fool you. I can think of no other reason that the manufacture would put them there.

Reviews.Title: no instructions
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this item and it came in the mail a couple of days ago with no instructions. i googled as well as you tubed it and still no luck. the adaptor is hard to open.

Reviews.Title: Great for well lit surveillance
Reviews.Author: marchio
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price, image is good enough. But it has zero low/ no light function.  Only good for daytime use.

Reviews.Title: does not fill all television sets...
Reviews.Author: janine allen "Ja9"
Reviews.Content: does not fill all television sets. otherwise great price and size enables for a great mini surveillance system when placed out of view.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for - but also very misleading :(
Reviews.Author: Douglas Borowy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to actually monitor my garage.  I currently have a QSEE dvr system which is great.  Now, back to the product.  I tested camera with my tv.  It worked fine with a decent picture.Now for the bad news.  The 6 IR bumps are just that.....  bumps.  this camera has NO ir capability.  Very Misleading.Now for the worse news.  Documentation says NTSC compliant.  Well that is a flat out lie.  DOES NOT WORK at all.  Only in PALI don't mind making a mistake but the way this is advertised is criminal.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Just Bob again
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe it would even work for this price but it does.  Picture quality is OK on a 4-inch monitor.  The IR LEDs are pointless.  Would only work to maybe 3 feet if you intend to use it in the dark and it wouldn't be in color.  The mounting bracket is pretty thin.  The case is solid metal.  The lens is a standard 12mmx0.5mm thread.  It will focus down to an inch or less.  No adjustments other than focus.  The AC adapter included is 8 Volts, not 12.  If you use it in a system, I don't know if it will work on 12 Volts.  It's pretty hard to beat for the price.

Reviews.Title: There are some issues with this camera
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Sadly I have to report that there are some issues with this camera and this is based upon my extensive use of small cctv camerasThe first to be aware of is the operating voltage, they will NOT work on 12v you have to use the supplied power supply which is approx 8v which is not good when incorporating into an existing system - mine being 12v!The second is that the infrared leds don't seem to work, I hold a known infrared light in front and I can see it, I illuminate my subject at night with the same source and it is visible, I hold a mirror or white paper in front of any of the cameras, I bought 3 and NOTHING, no infrared light!

Reviews.Title: Worked Great!
Reviews.Author: R. Marie "R.M."
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be complicated to install since it wasn't wireless.  But, it was easier and the video quality was better too.I recommend this over the mini wireless camera.  I have both and this works much better.  I have since purchased another one.

Reviews.Title: Not what is says it is
Reviews.Author: Marin
Reviews.Content: Not wireless at all. I sent it back just as soon as I opened it and saw the instructions. They need to fix the description on this item.

Reviews.Title: This camera is not night vision...but has fake LED
Reviews.Author: Hoang Khang Hy
Reviews.Content: this camera does not work well and it is not a night vision, camera has mood swing of sometime it work and sometime it don't...the LED light is fake. I regret I brought this product, and now I know why it is so cheap

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: EDWARD ALLEN
Reviews.Content: I really liked the performance of the cameras. After this comment, I am ordering  two more if they are in stock.

Reviews.Title: see the action
Reviews.Author: ele
Reviews.Content: I like the camera , I hook it up to the tv , so I turn it on it looks real good but the problem is that I left it on half a day and how do I see what the csmera cspture? Someone please help me to see what it capture using the tb.thank you ele

Reviews.Title: lyd  why? wastetime on making this
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: wait turn the lense its still not focused ? stand back well come closer yeah that bracket is in the way take it off i did now it wont stand up then put it back on ok? yeah its focused better this time but the picture still not clear well guess  you get what you pay for huh?

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: tricky1961
Reviews.Content: Can't beat the quality for the price, very good little camera. Highly recommended for use to monitor various locations. Very satified

Reviews.Title: Picture is OK for what you pay
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Random
Reviews.Content: This camera is OK, it produces reliable video but the image is a bit muddy.  Great for discreet surveillance as long as you're not trying to get high resolution face shots.  Useless in the dark, of course.

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for...
Reviews.Author: Carlos Dillard
Reviews.Content: In this case, you get what you paid for actually comes to mind. I purchased this camera to put in a discreet area, worried that one of my other cameras would be too obvious. The camera was the advertised size and actually functioned, which were the main two plus. After installing in a hallway I decided to shut the doors and turn off the lights to see how well the camera would function. My monitor went completely black, almost no night vision capability.The advantages:* The camera actually worked.* Small and discrete.* Actually the size shown in the picture.The disadvantages:* Very grainy picture at times.* Focus had to be manually adjusted.* Picture in complete darkness almost as bad a non-day/night camera.* Wire coming out of bottom of the camera makes it difficult to ceiling mount.* Had to purchase BNC-RCA adapter to make it work with existing wiring.Save your money, buy another camera.

Reviews.Title: Great color
Reviews.Author: P. M. Leavitt "JudgeGuy"
Reviews.Content: Camera was just as I hoped it would be. Really true colors as expected. Most of the other cameras that I have tried do not live up to the hype they claim.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: Roy Spanton
Reviews.Content: The stand you see at bottom of camera fell off within the first couple of days after receipt of camera and using it. So, I use it just fine without stand.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Sparky
Reviews.Content: Decent resolution, quality, and ability in dim-light.Item got 4 instead of 5 stars because I thought it had IR led's built in.

Reviews.Title: Decent resolution. Metal case.
Reviews.Author: Warren
Reviews.Content: This one doesn't have the IR led's and is pretty much good for any environment that has a good ambient light level. Not very good for super low light.Although I was able to mount it OK it, it is super difficult to mount this camera with the bracket attached as there isn't much room to fit a screwdriver. The pivot screws on the sides are super cheesy and easy to loose. If this was in an environment where there was vibration or wind I would be inclined to enhance the mounting bracket somehow. Also it doesn't adjust well without becoming loose.Those are minor complaints, so far so good and no buyers remorse. I would buy them again.

Reviews.Title: pretty sneaky, sis.
Reviews.Author: Lee Montgomery
Reviews.Content: this mini camera was used by me in a crazy weather balloon art piece that used a TV transmitter and lithium ion motorcycle battery....it worked...  really high up .. in the air.

Reviews.Title: woah! great eyeball!
Reviews.Author: tony helt
Reviews.Content: great camera to start my heads up display system.... used with vusix wrap 920 glases, its pretty epic to be able to see in detail digitally. wide angle lens works for lots of sight.... 8.5 VOLT VERSION CAN BE POWERED WITH A 9V BATTERY using a clip adapter. makes the HUD portable!  love it and price paid was absolutely, phenominal for such a great little camera! if i adjust it just right, i see distance better with this than i do with no glasses. was incredibly surprised!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Kevin Burrell
Reviews.Content: fantastic item. picture and video quality is remarkable. perfect size for being discrete. I highly recommend this product for any one who is interested in seeing what goes on around you when your not around.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Peter Brockie
Reviews.Content: The video quality is decent but not great (as expected) and the manual focus gives you a really nice range of distances.I haven't tried the audio so I can't comment on that, but as a camera (and a cheap one at that) it seems to do its job well.

Reviews.Title: small, but big picture!
Reviews.Author: Erik  H.
Reviews.Content: Thanks for making such a small, but well built camera - it fits anywhere and I can mount it wherever I want - thanks to the design!!! thanks 4 the fast safe shipping too!!

Reviews.Title: Incorrectly advertised.
Reviews.Author: vcwatson
Reviews.Content: I just received the camera in the mail today- and its obviously not what I wanted. Though it advertises that it operates wirelessly- it doesn't. I will be returning it and am very unhappy that this seller is allowed to give product specifications that are untrue.

Reviews.Title: range of view not very good
Reviews.Author: Einstein Wannabe "puzzled to the max"
Reviews.Content: It would be ok if you were installing to view something straight ahead. I did get the camera sooner than expected, but I need something with a wider range of view.

Reviews.Title: Mini Camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Nettles
Reviews.Content: I can't figure out how it works so I bought a wireless webcam instead. Sorry, I can't figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Never buy this product!
Reviews.Author: Bohdan
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 cameras and found that It is very bad product. Cameras doesn't work with 30 feet cable, It's work  only nearby DVR. I was too late (3 days) for returning, because I'm tested Its first for too short distance. Yesterday to try install Its, but  completely no image. Seller doesn't place information about so weak camera signal transmission. Never buy this product!

Reviews.Title: Cheap cheap cheap
Reviews.Author: Starstruck750
Reviews.Content: This camera wouldn't record when connected to our DVR, TV, or VCR.  You get what you pay for.  Overall, it was cheap and didn't have any directions.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: only works in pal mode crappy pivture sturdy outside case  but quality sux iwouldnt waist my time again that's for sure

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Tim Nelson
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by the little plastic bumps that are suppposed to look like IR LEDs, they're not.  So supplement with a IR spotlight or some other form of IR illumination.

Reviews.Title: Mini Camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Marshall
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and it has great quality pictures.  I'll use it for many purposes in the near future.

Reviews.Title: LYD Mini Cam
Reviews.Author: ROG
Reviews.Content: Item as described, I ordered 2, great price ,fast shipping. The color is great on these cameras, only problem was the 2 tiny screws, I lost one but found one that fit.Seller recommended.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Edeltraud Alatorre
Reviews.Content: arrived on time, works great , i have three of these and despite what some say, my night vision worked on it.

Reviews.Title: Product Review
Reviews.Author: Chansilven
Reviews.Content: I am not sure how this product works yet because I was unaware of all the items needed in order to use it. I share a house with a few other girls and thought it would be a good idea for us to have a camera in the house.

Reviews.Title: Very short range
Reviews.Author: MeSeemore
Reviews.Content: This camera doesnt pk up past about 3 - 4 ft....so unless someone looks right in the lens it is very blurry.  Useless.

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Mills "rhonda mills"
Reviews.Content: This is crappy. How to use? Go ask you cat. It sucks and a waste of time and money. Seriously.

Reviews.Title: �Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Dmg
Reviews.Content: I was do excited to revive my camera! When I got it it wouldn't wrk I had to go buy additional wires and still nothing all I can hear are sounds no picture no instructions really a waist off money.......and I am an amazon shopper never had this problem before

Reviews.Title: plz don't purchase
Reviews.Author: deven fomby
Reviews.Content: I orgered this product Aug 21 2012 it is Sep 24 2012. I still haven't received my camera. I went out and bought one to complete my security system but waiting over a month for any product is totally useless. I want my money back as requested but the product hasn't arrived yet. I contacted them and they can give me no date sent nor an arrival date. Utterly ridiculous. Plz learn from me also they keep blocking my complaints to further mislead consumers.

Reviews.Title: Mini Camera
Reviews.Author: Gene
Reviews.Content: Cameras work great! Very nice video. This camera is well worth the cost..Thank you for such great service. I may be ordering a couple more.

Reviews.Title: Wireless? Not out of the box it's not.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "SLR"
Reviews.Content: This product requires you to buy other products to make it wireless. This is not what I was expecting to get. It can be wireless, but is not capable of being wireless out of the box with no other items. Description doesn't say that.

Reviews.Title: thats it....
Reviews.Author: bittycrow
Reviews.Content: no software, no instructions besides showing common sense basically they could include some kind of something else with it even as cheap as it is a kids meal toy at mcdoalds has more to it.

Reviews.Title: No srews for the bracket, why? 325.453.7604
Reviews.Author: Fredrickjay Harder
Reviews.Content: HQRP Wired Spy Hidden CCTV Security Surveillance Mini Color CMOS Camera Day Night Vision IR Infrared 3.6mm Pinhole Lens w/ Audio plus HQRP CoasterWhy dose this not come with the screwes to atattch it to the bracket? 325.453.7604? Call me, I need the screwes?

easy installation
